name: UNSTOPPABLE
description: Win 8 matches in a row.

name: KING
description: Win a draft league.

name: BIN MAN
description: Lose a draft league.

name: DESTROYER
description: Double your opponent's score in a single gameweek.

name: ICEMAN
description: Lead for 30 weeks out of 38.

name: MIXOLOGIST
description: Win a game with 11 players from different teams.

name: ROCKETMAN
description: Get 2000+ points in a season.

name: FORTRESS
description: Win a gameweek with 6 clean sheets.

name: GUARDIAN
description: 22 keeper clean sheets.

name: POLITICIAN
description: Draw 4 matches.

name: PUNCH BAG
description: Lose 8 matches in a row.

name: TARGETMAN
description: Score 8 goals in a gameweek.

name: THE WALL
description: 3 clean sheets from players of same team.

name: EARLY BIRD
description: Drafted for the 25/26 season.

name: LUCKY
description: Win a match by 1 point three times.

name: DREAMCATCHER
description: Pick up the same player 4 times.

name: THE BEAST
description: 21+ points from a defender.

name: THE BOTTLER
description: Lose a draft on the final day.

name: THE GHOST
description: Go 3 weeks without a transfer.

name: THE REAPER
description: Beat a player in every matchup.

name: THE GOAT
description: Win 2 consecutive draft leagues.

name: THE WIZARD
description: Average score of 50 per week.

name: THE LOYAL
description: Keep 12 of your original 15 players all season.

name: THE SAVAGE
description: Beat every player in the league in a row.

name: THE TINKERMAN
description: Make 7 transfers in a single deadline.

name: THE COLLECTOR
description: Make over 200 transfers.

name: THE NUKE
description: Score 26+ points with a single player.

name: THE RELAXED
description: 25+ points from subs in a gameweek.

name: THE DROWNED
description: Score less than 15 points in a single gameweek.

name: THE COWBOY
description: Pick up 2 players who score 1 point each in a gameweek.

name: THE SPINELESS
description: Lose a league by 12 or more points.

name: THE SNAKE
description: Have a player from each position score 10+ points in a single week
